# Flame Arrow (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]] \[[[Fire Spells|fire]]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 3]], [[3rd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 5th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 5]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a drop of oil and a small piece of flint)

**Range:** Close (25 ft. + 5 ft./2 levels)

**Target:** Fifty projectiles, all of which must be together at the time of casting

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 283

This spell allows you to turn ammunition (such as arrows, crossbow bolts, shuriken, and sling stones) into fiery projectiles. Each piece of ammunition deals an extra 1d6 points of fire damage to any target it hits. A flaming projectile can easily ignite a flammable object or structure, but it wonâ€™t ignite a creature it strikes.
